tool_description: Predicts future traffic conditions using historical data patterns, machine learning models, and external factors like weather and events.

historical_data.description: Historical traffic data for pattern analysis

events_data.description: Scheduled events that may impact traffic

error_messages: Invalid segments: Need at least 1 road segment, maximum 100 allowed.
Invalid horizon: Prediction horizon must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
Insufficient historical data: Need at least 10 historical data points for accurate prediction.
Invalid model type: Use one of [neural_network, regression, ensemble].
Data quality error: Historical data contains inconsistencies or gaps that prevent accurate prediction.
Model training failed: Unable to train prediction model with provided data.
usage: Provide road_segments array, prediction_horizon in minutes, and historical_data. Optionally include weather_data and events_data for enhanced accuracy, and specify model_type for the prediction algorithm.

prediction_timestamp.description: When predictions were generated in ISO 8601 format

predicted_speeds.description: Predicted average speeds for each segment in km/h

congestion_forecast.description: Predicted congestion levels: low, moderate, heavy, severe

confidence_scores.description: Confidence level (0-100) for each segment prediction

trend_direction.description: Traffic trend for each segment: improving, stable, worsening
